rule.ID: RULE CHECK IF DOCUMENT TYPE IS NULL
RULE CHECK IF RETURN MAIL DATE IS NULL
RULE CHECK IF ONE RETURN FLAG IS CHECKED FOR PERSON
rule.sfwMessage: Atleast one address must be selected

rule.ID: RULE CHECK IF MPID IS NULL
RULE CHECK IF ORG MPID IS NULL
RULE RULE CHECK IF ONE RETURN FLAG IS CHECKED FOR ORG
rule.sfwMessage: Atleast one address must be selected

rule.ID: RULE IF RETURN MAIL DATE IS FUTURE DATE
rule.sfwMessage: End date should not future date.

rule.ID: RULE IF RETURN MAILS DATE IS FUTURE DATE
rule.sfwMessage: Return mail date should not be Future date.

rule.ID: RULE IF OLD END DATE CHANGED
rule.sfwMessage: Process does not allow to change / remove an End date.

rule.ID: RULE IF NO OR MULTIPLE RETURN ADDR SELECTED
rule.sfwMessage: Select Only One Return Mail Address

rule.ID: RULE IF MANAGERS APPR RQ FOR ADDR CHANGE

item.ID: RULE IF RETURN MAILS DATE IS FUTURE DATE
RULE IF NO OR MULTIPLE RETURN ADDR SELECTED
RULE IF MANAGERS APPR RQ FOR ADDR CHANGE
RULE CHECK IF DOCUMENT TYPE IS NULL
RULE CHECK IF RETURN MAIL DATE IS NULL
RULE IF RETURN MAILS DATE IS FUTURE DATE
RULE IF RETURN MAIL DATE IS FUTURE DATE
RULE IF OLD END DATE CHANGED
RULE IF NO OR MULTIPLE RETURN ADDR SELECTED
RULE CHECK IF MPID IS NULL
RULE CHECK IF ORG MPID IS NULL
RULE RULE CHECK IF ONE RETURN FLAG IS CHECKED FOR ORG

query.sfwSql: Select RMAIL.*,ADDR.*,DOCUMENT_ID,DOC_TYPE,DOCUMENT_NAME,APP_NAME,GROUP_NAME from SGT_RETURNED_MAIL RMAIL LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ADDRESS ADDR ON RMAIL.ADDRESS_ID=ADDR.ADDRESS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_DOCUMENT DOC ON RMAIL.DOC_ID=DOC.DOCUMENT_ID AND RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE='PEND' Where RMAIL.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID UNION ALL Select RMAIL.*,ADDR.*,DOCUMENT_ID,DOC_TYPE,DOCUMENT_NAME,APP_NAME,GROUP_NAME from SGT_RETURNED_MAIL RMAIL LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ADDRESS ADDR ON RMAIL.ADDRESS_ID=ADDR.ADDRESS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_HE_DOCUMENT HEDOC ON RMAIL.DOC_ID=HEDOC.DOCUMENT_ID AND RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE='HEDC' Where RMAIL.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID UNION ALL Select RMAIL.*,ADDR.*,DOCUMENT_ID,RMAIL.OTHER_DOCUMENT_TYPE as DOC_TYPE,DOCUMENT_NAME,APP_NAME,GROUP_NAME from SGT_RETURNED_MAIL RMAIL LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ADDRESS ADDR ON RMAIL.ADDRESS_ID=ADDR.ADDRESS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_HE_DOCUMENT HEDOC ON RMAIL.DOC_ID=HEDOC.DOCUMENT_ID AND RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE='PEND' Where RMAIL.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID and RMAIL.DOC_ID is NULL

Select RMAIL.*,ADDR.*,DOCUMENT_ID,DOC_TYPE,DOCUMENT_NAME,APP_NAME,GROUP_NAME from SGT_RETURNED_MAIL RMAIL LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_ORG_ADDRESS ADDR ON RMAIL.ORG_ADDRESS_ID=ADDR.ORG_ADDRESS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_DOCUMENT DOC ON RMAIL.DOC_ID=DOC.DOCUMENT_ID AND RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE='PEND' Where ADDR.ORG_ID = @ORG_ID UNION ALL Select RMAIL.*,ADDR.*,DOCUMENT_ID,DOC_TYPE,DOCUMENT_NAME,APP_NAME,GROUP_NAME from SGT_RETURNED_MAIL RMAIL LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_ORG_ADDRESS ADDR ON RMAIL.ORG_ADDRESS_ID=ADDR.ORG_ADDRESS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_HE_DOCUMENT HEDOC ON RMAIL.DOC_ID=HEDOC.DOCUMENT_ID AND RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE='HEDC' Where ADDR.ORG_ID = @ORG_ID UNION ALL Select RMAIL.*,ADDR.*,DOCUMENT_ID,RMAIL.OTHER_DOCUMENT_TYPE as DOC_TYPE,DOCUMENT_NAME,APP_NAME,GROUP_NAME from SGT_RETURNED_MAIL RMAIL LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_ORG_ADDRESS ADDR ON RMAIL.ORG_ADDRESS_ID=ADDR.ORG_ADDRESS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_HE_DOCUMENT HEDOC ON RMAIL.DOC_ID=HEDOC.DOCUMENT_ID AND RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE='PEND' Where ADDR.ORG_ID = @ORG_ID and RMAIL.DOC_ID is NULL

SELECT SP.MPI_PERSON_ID,(SP.FIRST_NAME + ' ' + SP.LAST_NAME)NAME,RMAIL.*,ADDR.*,DOCUMENT_ID,DOC_TYPE,DOCUMENT_NAME,APP_NAME,GROUP_NAME, (ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_LINE_1,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_LINE_2,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_CITY,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_STATE_VALUE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.FOREIGN_PROVINCE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_COUNTRY_VALUE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_ZIP_CODE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_ZIP_4_CODE,'') + ' '+ ISNULL(ADDR.FOREIGN_POSTAL_CODE,'')) ADDRESS, SCVDOCTYPESOURCE.DESCRIPTION AS DOCTYPESOURCEDESCRIPTION,SCVREASON.DESCRIPTION AS REASONDESCRIPTION FROM SGT_RETURNED_MAIL RMAIL INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP ON SP.PERSON_ID = RMAIL.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ADDRESS ADDR ON RMAIL.ADDRESS_ID=ADDR.ADDRESS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_DOCUMENT DOC ON RMAIL.DOC_ID=DOC.DOCUMENT_ID AND RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE='PEND' LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCVDOCTYPESOURCE WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCVDOCTYPESOURCE.CODE_ID = RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_ID AND SCVDOCTYPESOURCE.CODE_VALUE = RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCVREASON WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCVREASON.CODE_ID = RMAIL.REASON_ID AND SCVREASON.CODE_VALUE = RMAIL.REASON_VALUE WHERE RMAIL.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE UNION ALL SELECT SP.MPI_PERSON_ID,(SP.FIRST_NAME + ' ' + SP.LAST_NAME)NAME,RMAIL.*,ADDR.*,DOCUMENT_ID,DOC_TYPE,DOCUMENT_NAME,APP_NAME,GROUP_NAME, (ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_LINE_1,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_LINE_2,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_CITY,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_STATE_VALUE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.FOREIGN_PROVINCE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_COUNTRY_VALUE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_ZIP_CODE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_ZIP_4_CODE,'') + ' '+ ISNULL(ADDR.FOREIGN_POSTAL_CODE,'')) ADDRESS, SCVDOCTYPESOURCE.DESCRIPTION AS DOCTYPESOURCEDESCRIPTION,SCVREASON.DESCRIPTION AS REASONDESCRIPTION FROM SGT_RETURNED_MAIL RMAIL INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP ON SP.PERSON_ID = RMAIL.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ADDRESS ADDR ON RMAIL.ADDRESS_ID=ADDR.ADDRESS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_HE_DOCUMENT HEDOC ON RMAIL.DOC_ID=HEDOC.DOCUMENT_ID AND RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE='HEDC' LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCVDOCTYPESOURCE WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCVDOCTYPESOURCE.CODE_ID = RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_ID AND SCVDOCTYPESOURCE.CODE_VALUE = RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCVREASON WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCVREASON.CODE_ID = RMAIL.REASON_ID AND SCVREASON.CODE_VALUE = RMAIL.REASON_VALUE WHERE RMAIL.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE UNION ALL SELECT SP.MPI_PERSON_ID,(SP.FIRST_NAME + ' ' + SP.LAST_NAME)NAME,RMAIL.*,ADDR.*,DOCUMENT_ID,RMAIL.OTHER_DOCUMENT_TYPE AS DOC_TYPE,DOCUMENT_NAME,APP_NAME,GROUP_NAME, (ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_LINE_1,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_LINE_2,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_CITY,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_STATE_VALUE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.FOREIGN_PROVINCE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_COUNTRY_VALUE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_ZIP_CODE,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(ADDR.ADDR_ZIP_4_CODE,'') + ' '+ ISNULL(ADDR.FOREIGN_POSTAL_CODE,'')) ADDRESS, SCVDOCTYPESOURCE.DESCRIPTION AS DOCTYPESOURCEDESCRIPTION,SCVREASON.DESCRIPTION AS REASONDESCRIPTION FROM SGT_RETURNED_MAIL RMAIL INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP ON SP.PERSON_ID = RMAIL.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ADDRESS ADDR ON RMAIL.ADDRESS_ID=ADDR.ADDRESS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_HE_DOCUMENT HEDOC ON RMAIL.DOC_ID=HEDOC.DOCUMENT_ID AND RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE='PEND' LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCVDOCTYPESOURCE WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCVDOCTYPESOURCE.CODE_ID = RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_ID AND SCVDOCTYPESOURCE.CODE_VALUE = RMAIL.DOC_TYPE_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCVREASON WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCVREASON.CODE_ID = RMAIL.REASON_ID AND SCVREASON.CODE_VALUE = RMAIL.REASON_VALUE WHERE RMAIL.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE AND RMAIL.DOC_ID IS NULL
